sentences: Lapsed olid väga põnevad ja mängisid nagu paganad.
context: The word 'pagana' is the nominative singular form of the Estonian adjective meaning 'pagan'. It describes someone who follows traditional or non-Christian religious beliefs. In modern usage, it can also be used more broadly to describe wild, uncivilized, or unruly behavior in a somewhat humorous or exaggerated way.
